explanation: [0-0] Two young people are riding motorcycles on a road in a residential area. The person in front is riding a red motorcycle, wearing a red helmet, with both hands on the helmet. The person behind is riding a black motorcycle, wearing a black helmet.

[0-6] The person in front takes off his helmet and turns to look at the person behind. Then two more motorcycles arrive, one with a person in green clothes riding a red motorcycle and another with a person in yellow clothes riding a black motorcycle, they stop side by side. The man in the red helmet takes out a bottle of water and throws it to the person wearing the black helmet.
